name: Dungeon Revolution
description:
Godot Wild Jam 22. Uses Godot 3.2.1-mono stable. Art/animation made in Blender. SFX with Audacity.

We took a crack at making a 3D dungeon-crawler game. There's a lot unfinished, but you can kill the monsters and collect the key items to win.

How to play:

  • WASD to move. Mouse to Aim
  • Left Mouse to attack. Right mouse to block.
  • Space to jump. Escape to quit.
  • You can take about 5 unblocked hits and survive. No health bar
  • Picking up key items restores health. There's three you need to find to win.

Credits:

Dylan Melisko: Art, Animation, Level Design

Garret Richardson: Programming, SFX

Yvonne Nguyen: Brain Beast Noises
